scripts.db:create: createuser rdbs_node; createdb rdbs_node -O rdbs_node && createdb rdbs_node_test -O rdbs_node
scripts.db:test:reset: psql -c 'drop database "rdbs_node_test"'; createdb rdbs_node_test -O rdbs_node && knex migrate:latest --env testing
scripts.test: npm run -s db:test:reset &&  mocha -r mocha.setup --ui bdd --timeout 200 src/*.test.js
